page.title: 05Oundle School cont'd...
page.content: We went to the Music School. At the chemistry block there are 16 rooms. In the cloisters there is a big room called the Common Room for the Masters. In the computer department there was a boy who was making a computer. The Cripps library was built by the Cripps family in 1903. At School House we went into the dining room to see what it was like, it had lots of silver cups which the boys had won. The Great Hall is used for many concerts, debates and the film society. The Great Hall is very impressive and was built in 19O7 and was designed by Arthur Blomfield. This is how much the parents pay for the boys each year: four million and fifty seven thousand and one hundred and twenty five pounds.
